comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Joseph Emanuel Newburger (b. 1853) served on the New York State Supreme Court, and was one of the founders of the Jewish Theological Seminary of America. www.jewishencyclopedia.com/view.jsp?artid=252&letter=N

comment.author: 70251312@N00
